name: Covenant Of Slayers
description:
Covenant of slayers is an arena boss slaying game! Play a variation of monster hunters that joined the covenant to defeat the evil monsters of the world Eteria. Try unique play styles with the fighters and item sets for different monster hunters. Can you defeat all the monsters?

Features
  • 3 Unique Boss monsters (12 planned at release).
    • The Wisp Mother (Wisp).
    • The Blood Prince (Vampire).
    • The Gravekeeper (Spectral). 
  • 3 Unique playable monster hunters (5 planned at release)
    • The Fire Mage, Summoner of flames.
    • The Red Warrior,  Past General of the red army.
    • The Shadow  Assasin, Past member of the shadow cult.
  • 9 Total unique encounters (60 planned at release).
  • 9 Legendary boss loot items that scale your stats  and adds powers to you and your abilities. (36 planned at release)
  • Use your skills to slay all bosses with all hunters and get amazing loot.
Controlls
  • Move with W/A/S/D.
  • Dash by double clicking one of the move Keys W/A/S/D.
  • Shoot/Basic attack by clicking  left mouse button.
  • Class ability by clicking  right mouse button.
  • Esc to go back to menu.
The Community and Updates

Join the aregan games discord to recive updates and info about updates and the game earlier. 

Most of the game content is not done yet so the game is short but that will change in in later updates that will mostly be focusing on adding content.

Roadmap, updates and releases

  1. Alpha release, 3 bosses, 3 playable character.
  2. Suporter editon, adds a boss and a playable character for people who support the game with payments.
  3. Beta release, 3 + 4(NEW) bosses, 3 + 1(New)  playable characters.
  4. Full release(5$/€),  7 + 5(New) bosses, 4 + 1(New) playable characters.
  5. Christmas Free update, adds a boss and a playable character.
  6. Easter Free update, adds a boss and a playable character.
Bugs and Feedback

 Note: The game is in alpha currently so bugs may appear but to inprove the game for release feedback and bug reports would be awesome!:)  The game auto saves by it self after bosses and closing the game with exit button.
 For content creators, please do post your content in the comments or send them to the aregan games discord. I would love to see what you think of the game and perhaps when game is out and costs money you will receive free game key:D
